content: cables and moss worsted weight watch cap by kathryn mcconaghie mcconaghiek@gmail com similar construction and size as the original cables and moss watch cap pattern except this hat is worked in worsted weight yarn and is designed to be reversible needles 4 5 mm us 7 16 circular and set of five double pointed needles dpns 2 cable needles yarn worsted weight 170 yds 76 g stonehedge fiber mill shepherd s wool gauge 22 sts/28 rnds over 4 worked in moss stitch finished hat measurements 10-3/4 tall uncuffed 16 circumference cabled cuff unstretched 19 circumference moss stitch top unstretched note written instructions for charts a and b and a chart for the decreases are on the final page chart a cuff key to chart symbols and abbreviations  ɣ  ɣ  6 k1 knit one st = stitch cn = cable needle  ɣ  ɣ  5 p1 purl one lhn left hand needle  ɣ  ɣ  4 ktbl knit through the back loop  ɣ  ɣ  3 to twist st  ɣ  ɣ  2 twisted 3-stitch cable with  ɣ  ɣ  1 center purl − place 1st st knit on cn and hold to 6 5 4 3 2 1 front − place 2nd st purl on another cn decreasing techniques and hold to back k2tog knit next two sts together − ktbl 3rd st next knit st on lhn ssp slip 1st st knitwise slip 2nd st − purl st on back cn knitwise replace both sts on lhn − ktbl st on front cn purl the 2 sts together through the back loop cables and moss - worsted weight watch cap-20220411 directions cast on 114 sts and join to work in the round place marker for beginning of round work rnds 1 through 6 of chart a four 4 times work rnds 1 and 2 of chart a one more time for about 4 from cast on work round 3 of chart b beginning with p2tog k2tog to result in 112 sts total work round 4 of chart b one time work chart b eight 8 times for approximately 8-1/2 from cast on edge end after completing a round 4 of chart on final round set markers for 8 decrease sections of 14 sts each decrease every other round as follows rnds 1 5 9 *k1 p1 to within 2 sts of marker ssp repeat from * around rnds 2 6 10 *k1 p1 to within 1 st of marker p1 repeat from * around rnds 3 7 11 *p1 k1 to within 3 st of marker p1 k2tog repeat from * around rnds 4 8 12 p1 k1 around final round has 8 sts between markers 64 sts total decrease every round as follows round 13 *k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 ssp repeat from * around round 14 *k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 k2tog repeat from * around round 15 *p1 k1 p1 k1 ssp
